com.variant.client.servlet

Interface ServletConnection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.variant.client.Connection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServletConnectionImpl

    public interface ServletConnection
extends com.variant.client.Connection

    Servlet-aware wrapper around bare client's implementation of Connection. Replaces bare client's session creation methods with ones which take an instance of HttpServletRequest and return the narrower, servlet-aware ServletSession

    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
